content:
Hello, I'm building a questionnaire containing items for the Glasgow coma scale. I'm wondering if there is already a questionnaire for this defined somewhere including a form data extraction into an observation in, i.g. in the following format: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/observation-example-glasgow.json.html
Any hints are welcome. Thanks folks.
Check out LHC forms at NIH form maker

The extraction should be easy to add-- you just put in the observationExtract extension. Here is an example of doing that (but not for Glasgow Coma Scale): https://github.com/lhncbc/lforms-fhir-app/blob/master/e2e-tests/data/R4/weight-height-questionnaire.json
